ModMetaData.name: Adeptus Mechanicus: Magos Xenobiologis
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6.1.1 Adds factions using xenos weapons from my Armoury mod. Requires new start or one of those faction managers
Small addon for my weapons mod, Adds NPC factions using xenos weapons.
Playable addons for various races are linked in the description below
Requires new start or Orion's faction discovery mod to add them to an exsisting map (Thanks to BadNeighbour for testing)
Current
